name: BOTS
description:
BOTS is the game when it comes to high intensity, skill driven Couch coop game. Inspired by classics couch multiplayer games, it's a 1 to 4 player local arcade game where pilots control lightning fast Battle Mechs called BOTS, collect powerups, fight off waves of various enemy AIs as well as each other. Unlock color skins, new levels and new BOTS simply by playing and having fun.

  • 12 Color Schemes
  • 7 Playable BOTS
  • 7 Varied Level Types
  • 14 Unlockable Achivements
